title: ALALA
content:
ALALA was the personified spirit (daimona) of the war-cry. She was the daughter of Polemos (War).

Pindar, Dithyrambs Fragment 78 (trans. Sandys) (Greek lyric C5th B.C.) :
        "Harken! O Alala (War-Shout), daughter of Polemos (War)! Prelude of spears! To whom soldiers are sacrificed
        for their city's sake in the holy sacrifice of death."

A complete bibliography of the translations quoted on this page.
